allow: Bash(node -e "require(''dotenv'').config({path: ''.env.local''}); const { execSync } = require(''child_process''); execSync(''npx prisma migrate deploy'', { stdio: ''inherit'' })")

Bash(git commit -m "fix(types): export ModelTier as value, interfaces as type-only

Split exports per Sonnet analysis:
- ModelTier enum: export as value (needed for runtime usage)
- ComplexityScore, ProcessingConfig, ModelCosts: export type (type-only)

Fixes: ''ModelTier'' is not exported from ai-model-router
because export type {} only works for types, not enums.")
